rdf:Description.dc:description: "This document is meant to complement the Energy and Utilities Board publication, Petroleum Industry Activity In Native Prairie and Parkland Areas: Guidelines for Surface Disturbance."-- Acknowledgements.

The preparation and publication of this book was made possible by funding from Alberta Environment, Alberta Sustainable Resource Development (Public Lands), and the Special Areas Board. The following partners assisted with printing costs: TransCanada Pipelines Ltd. Husky Energy, Canadian Natural Resources Ltd., the Energy and Utilities Board and the Alberta Native Plant Council.
University of Alberta copy in the Prairie Provinces Collection.
